code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class AddUser extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.userAdd={};this.state={first_name:"",last_name:"",bio:"",age:1,isHappy:false};}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:element=>this.userForm=element,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"First name:",onChange:e=>this.setState({first_name:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Last name:",onChange:e=>this.setState({last_name:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Biografy",onChange:e=>this.setState({bio:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Age:",onChange:e=>this.setState({age:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex",alignItems:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"isHappy",children:"Are you happy?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:"isHappy",onChange:e=>this.setState({isHappy:e.target.checked})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{this.userForm.reset();this.userAdd={first_name:this.state.first_name,last_name:this.state.last_name,bio:this.state.bio,age:this.state.age,isHappy:this.state.isHappy};if(this.props.user){this.userAdd.id=this.props.user.id;}this.props.onAdd(this.userAdd);},type:"button",children:"Add"})]});}};export default AddUser;
